prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Guy Davenport Papers, 1961 & 1979, Accession #10539-q, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred from the Rare Book Division on July 8, 1992.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This addition to the Guy Davenport Collection contains a copy of the author's doctoral dissertation as well as a page proof and review of his book, DaVinci's Bicycle: Ten Stories by Guy Davenport.

did.unittitle: A Reading of I-XXX of The Cantos of Ezra Pound,a doctoral dissertation for Harvard University, by Guy Davenport 1961

scopecontent.p: The original copy of the dissertation is held at Harvard University.

did.unittitle: DaVinci's Bicycle: Ten Stories by Guy Davenport 1979
Review of DaVinci's Bicycle: Ten Stories by Guy Davenport, with autograph revisions, by Jerome Klinkowitz, with two printed reviews of DaVinci's... and Tatlin![1979]
